effect.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.
effect.full: Friendly Pokémon next to this Pokémon in double and triple battles each have a 30% chance of being cured of any major status ailment after each turn.

description.black-white: May heal an ally’s status conditions.
description.black-2-white-2: May heal an ally’s status conditions.
description.x-y: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.
description.sun-moon: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.
description.sword-shield: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.
